name: Drift Revolution
description:
Drift revolution brings revolution to drift racing games. This game gives you everything what you want in a drift game - cool cars, detailed customizations, body kits and interiors, rims, tires, suspension modifications, time attack play modes, battle modes and much more. Download the game now and experience the best drift racing mobile game.



Car Customization Options
-----
* Body kit - front & rear bumpers, hoods, air intakes, running boards, fenders, spoilers, etc.
* Interior - seats, cages, steering wheels, gear shifters
* Paint - customize vehicle body, but also customize each body kit or interior part color
* Drift smoke color
* Rims - 42 different rim styles, you can also change rim colors
* Tires - 7 different drift tires
* 40 different decals
* and much more!



Car Suspension Options
-----
* Tune your car's wheel offset, wheel camber, travel, etc.
* Tune wheel width, rim size or wheel size
* Tune suspension to your liking and see how the car reacts on the track



Car Power Options
-----
* Upgrade your engine, intake or gearbox and make your car faster and more powerful
* Upgrade brakes or make your car lighter and drift faster



Game Modes - There are 4 popular drift modes available
-----
* Drift Mode - this is the main play mode, try to make as many drifts as possible and collect drift points to win more money
* Time Attack - drive as fast as possible and try to finish the track in the limited time to win as much money as possible
* Training Mode - no drift point or time limits, just drive however you want and make your drifts better
* Battle Mode - race against the opponents and try to finish the track before they do, but try to collect as many drift points as possible to make them count and win money when you finish the finish line
* There are 10 maps available for your drifting races



You can also change the camera view inside the gameplay - drive from interior, driver's point of view inside the car, or drive from the outside - front wheel camera or normal camera. What are you waiting for? Choose your drift car, customize it, tune it, set it up the way you like and start winning races!
